entities.name: galleon
entities.description: Galleons are being used by Ron and Harry as fake currency.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who is examining his fake Galleon.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts that is competing in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts that is competing in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: quidditch cup
entities.description: The Quidditch Cup has not been held for a long time and is adding to the excitement of the forthcoming game.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is a student at Hogwarts who is insisting on almost daily practices for the Quidditch match.

entities.name: ravenclaws
entities.description: Ravenclaws are one of the four houses at Hogwarts that will be playing both Gryffindor and Slytherin over the coming year.

entities.name: hufflepuffs
entities.description: Hufflepuffs are one of the four houses at Hogwarts that will be playing both Gryffindor and Slytherin over the coming year.

entities.name: heads of house
entities.description: The Heads of House of the competing teams are determined to see their side's victory.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is realizing how much interest and excitement there is in the forthcoming Quidditch match.

relationships.description: Ron is examining his fake Galleon.
Angelina is insisting on almost daily practices for the Quidditch match.
Ravenclaws will be playing both Gryffindor and Slytherin over the coming year.
Hufflepuffs will be playing both Gryffindor and Slytherin over the coming year.
The Heads of House are determined to see their side's victory.
Harry is realizing how much interest and excitement there is in the forthcoming Quidditch match.
